QuestData.Title: Speaker of the Horde
QuestData.Description: Your Horde has grown powerful, eclipsing some of de troll empires in its magnitude.$b$bFor saving my daughter, you have earned de right to a presence in my city.$b$BSince my daughter has taken such a fondness to you, you may join her in de Great Seal beneath us. De servants there will answer to you now.$b$bTalanji seems excited by whatever she has planned for your people. I look forward to being amused by it later.$B$bZolani can show you a way down dat does not involve falling.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Princess Talanji within the Great Seal.
QuestData.RewardText:
My father believes he is indulging me. He has ruled for two hundred years, many lifetimes of trolls. In his mind, de threats dat face our kingdom are minor.
I have seen too much to believe dat.
So since my father and his advisors would not help, I turned to someone who would.
Your warchief needs our fleet, and I need her champions. I have a battle plan here on what to do.
Choose your first move. If de Horde helps my people, den I will help de Horde.
